subject: oem_ibm: Calculate Heartbeat Timeout
commitMessage:
oem_ibm: Calculate Heartbeat Timeout

This commit adds change to calculate the Heartbeat timeout
to be sent to host

Signed-off-by: Sagar Srinivas <sagar.srinivas@ibm.com>

std::cerr?

when will the if part get executed? since you have initialized isSetEventReceiverSent to false.
Just for my understanding.

This is to check if the setEventReceiver has been sent to host or hypervisor. for the first time it is always sent to host in reply to the GetTID command. the heartbeat timer for host and hypervisor will differ accordingly.
